history.proof: intros sigma s s' H1 H2. unfold st_compatible. intros c pl0 pl1 H3 H4. unfold state_correct_wrt_sign in H1, H2. specialize (H1 c pl0 H3) as [n1 [H5 H6]]. specialize (H2 c pl1 H4) as [n2 [H7 H8]]. rewrite H5 in H7. hauto lq: on depth: 3.

original: intros sigma s s' H1 H2. unfold st_compatible. intros c pl0 pl1 H3 H4. unfold state_correct_wrt_sign in H1, H2. specialize (H1 c pl0 H3) as [n1 [H5 H6]]. specialize (H2 c pl1 H4) as [n2 [H7 H8]]. rewrite H5 in H7. subst. auto.
